full_summary:
# F1571-221445 – Paramount East Complex Electrical Reconstruction

## Notice Details

*   **Publication Date**: 2023-06-12
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-29 14:00:00
*   **Tender Status**: Expired
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4051622279

## Contract Information

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-08-31
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-06-30

## Notice Overview

The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the electrical reconstruction of the Steveston Paramount East Complex, a project owned by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

Project Details:

*   Location: 12740 Trites Road, Richmond, BC (SCH Paramount)
*   Project Scope: Replace the existing 480V power distribution system with a new permanent full-rated normal power distribution system at 120/208/347/600V, 3-phase, and 4-wire.

Completion Requirements:

*   The work must be completed on or before June 30, 2024.

Eligibility and Proposal Requirements
======================================

All technically qualified and financially sound contractors are invited to submit their bids electronically through the government's tendering website. Please review the guidelines set out in the invitation to quality (ITQ) document attached to the notice for detailed requirements.

Please address any inquiries to:

Summer Wong (SPAC/PSPC)  
elle-la / she-her  
summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note
----

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price. Bidders must demonstrate compliance with relevant laws and regulations in their proposal. The notice can be viewed in its entirety by visiting [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16558662?extsite=MTY1NTg2NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16558662?extsite=MTY1NTg2NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).   - renamed - comments
